BSI_CHANGE_SETTING_MODAL_BODY: Changing this setting will re-launch Discord. Are you sure you want to do this?
BSI_HARDWARE_ACCELERATION_DISABLED_MSG: Hi, there! We've noticed that you've disabled hardware acceleration. "Better Status Indicators" recommends leaving this feature on for significantly better results â€” visually and quantitatively.
BSI_STATUS_COLOR_CHANGE_NOTE: **Note**: Due to limitations, color changes won't take effect straight away. To fix this, please either go to a different guild or channel. If you've modified the "Invisible" color, you may need to change your status.
BSI_STATUS_DISPLAY_DEFAULT_OPT: Default: Modern, beautiful, and easy on your eyes.
BSI_STATUS_DISPLAY_CLASSIC_OPT: Classic: Tried and true color-blind mode.
BSI_THEME_VARIABLES_DESC: Adds some variables that are useful for themes (i.e. predefined status colors).
BSI_TRUE_STATUS_DESC: Forces the status displayed under the user popout / profile modal to its true color whenever a user is performing an activity.
BSI_CLIENT_SWITCH_MESSAGE_HEADERS_DESC: Displays the {client} status indicator in message headers.
BSI_CLIENT_SWITCH_MEMBERS_LIST_DESC: Displays the {client} status indicator in the members list.
BSI_CLIENT_SWITCH_USER_POPOUT_MODAL_DESC: Displays the {client} status indicator in the user popout / profile modal.
BSI_CLIENT_SWITCH_DM_DESC: Displays the {client} status indicator in direct messages.
BSI_CLIENT_SWITCH_MATCH_COLOR_DESC: Fills the {client} status indicator with the corresponding color of the users' status.
BSI_CLIENT_SWITCH_AVATAR_STATUS_DESC: Displays the {client} status indicator within the avatar. If disabled, the mobile indicator will be displayed next to usernames.
BSI_CLIENT_SWITCH_SHOW_ON_SELF_DESC: Displays the {client} status indicator for yourself; requires the {client} "Preserve Status" setting to be enabled.
BSI_CLIENT_SWITCH_SHOW_ON_BOTS_DESC: Displays the {client} status indicator for bot users.
BSI_STREAMING_SWITCH_SHOW_ON_SELF_DESC: Displays the streaming status indicator for yourself.
BSI_DESKTOP_SWITCH_PRESERVE_STATUS_DESC: Displays the desktop status indicator even if the user is active on web or mobile.
BSI_DESKTOP_SWITCH_UNIVERSAL_STATUS_DESC: Displays the desktop status indicator whenever it's available; requires the desktop "Preserve Status" setting to be enabled.
BSI_MOBILE_SWITCH_MATCH_COLOR_DESC: Fills the mobile status indicator with the corresponding color of the users' status; requires the mobile "Avatar Status" setting to be disabled.
BSI_MOBILE_SWITCH_PRESERVE_STATUS_DESC: Displays the mobile status indicator even if the user is active on desktop.
BSI_MOBILE_SWITCH_DISABLE_STATUS_DESC: Completely disables all functionality of the mobile status indicator.
BSI_WEB_SWITCH_PRESERVE_STATUS_DESC: Displays the web status indicator even if the user is active on desktop or mobile.
BSI_MODULES_CHANGE_NOTE: **Note**: Due to limitations, some modules and settings won't take effect straight away. To fix this, please either go to a different guild or channel.
BSI_MODULE_SETTINGS_HIDDEN: Settings have been hidden as the module is __**disabled**__. Click here to enable it back:
BSI_MODULE_SETTINGS_MISSING: Settings aren't available for this module. :smiling_face_with_tear:
BSI_STATUS_EVERYWHERE_TYPING_STATUS_DESC: Set whether or not the typing status indicator should be displayed in chat avatars, and for who. **Disclaimer**: Enabling this may impact performance on slower hardware. Please proceed with caution.
BSI_RADIAL_STATUS_INSET_DESC: Change the inset of the avatar picture, lower inset will make the avatar smaller and will have a bigger gap between the status circle and the avatar.
